case.title: Concert tonight? 6:30PM Not too much time... (over 50)
case.text: I am looking for a gentleman who is over 50 years of age and who is 420+++ who is interested in going to a free concert with me, a woman nearing 50, tonight, Friday, at 6:30PM. We'll need to leave earlier than that, so quick responses are pretty much the only ones I can consider. Include your name, age, pic, and 420 status in your reply. Thank you.
